entry.title: Newest OSGi Additions
entry.content: The OSGi Tutorial Page has been updated with a few new labs. Coming shortly we will finally have up our blueprint services lab, and we do have a quick Sling final lab that will exploit our basic bundle and add some HTTP capabilities.

entry.title: Apache Jackrabbit - Starting From Scratch Tutorial Up
entry.content: Our newest Apache Jackrabbit tutorial has been put up on out Apache Jackrabbit Labs Page. We expect quote a few more will start making there appearances soon now that the same code has been written for in class exercises.
